comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: All, Thanks for the nice parade ride (except Julian of course). Steve actually misspoke about my retirement agenda; that was my day yesterday... Cheers, Dennis

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Dennis, Sounds like a good recurring schedule to me, though! Thanks for joining us!! Cheers, Steve

comments.author: Julian
comments.body: Wow...called out by the Big Dog himself! Clearly I failed to allow Dennis to get a firm grip on my wheel before rolling up to Dave and Greg. I blame everything on Dave however - he gave me a 'look' that reminded me of the old days 10 or more years ago when we used to ride Flag together. So while reminiscing I got lost and took a wrong turn _cough_ it was a great ride by all. Dennis now that you are retired we will see much more of you on these rides right?

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Julian, That "look" may have looked like the "look," but it wasn't _that_ look. These days, the look belies not so much a challenge as a plea for mercy. It really was a great ride, eh? Thanks for bringing a new level of civility to the pack, Dennis! DU
